price: 76.Yeeylwonna hinnay dambi Siinil yanih, kinnih immay Yallaa kee kay farmoytit Nummayseeh Amaanat yacayu waamah Yallah hee xagana duudusaah meqe taama Abaah umaanek yaxxeereemil Yallak meesite niara, toysa Diggah Yalli uma taamak yexxeereeh isik meesita mara kicnih.
arabic: بَلَىٰۚ مَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: balā man awfā biʿahdihi wa-ittaqā fa-inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-mutaqīna
